data.text: A flash of light cut through the horizon.
data.processed: <story>A flash of light cut through the horizon.

data.text:
Even though they were running so far away that I couldn't make 
out their face, I could still hear their breath.
data.processed:
<story>Even though they were running so far away that I couldn't make 
<story>out their face, I could still hear their breath.

data.text:
They were running wildly and desperately, but still filled with 
pride. The way they were forging ahead, it was almost like―
data.processed:
<story>They were running wildly and desperately, but still filled with 
<story>pride. The way they were forging ahead, it was almost like―

data.text:
Even though I didn't know her name or her face, 
I wanted to see her run again. Even though I 
had searched, I still couldn't find her――
data.processed:
<story>Even though I didn't know her name or her face, 
<story>I wanted to see her run again. Even though I 
<story>had searched, I still couldn't find her――

data.text:
……In the end, even after months of searching, I still couldn't 
find out what her name was, let alone anything else about her.
data.processed:
<story>……In the end, even after months of searching, I still couldn't 
<story>find out what her name was, let alone anything else about her.

data.text:
Since I couldn't think of anything but that 『Hero』, it made me 
want to read a heroic tale. I came looking for a suitable 
biography…… but I just can't seem to find them.
data.processed:
<story>Since I couldn't think of anything but that 『Hero』, it made me 
<story>want to read a heroic tale. I came looking for a suitable 
<story>biography…… but I just can't seem to find them.

data.text: ……U-um…… can I help you with anything?
data.processed: <story>……U-um…… can I help you with anything?

data.text:
Z-Zenno Rob Roy. T-the librarian……! 
Um, if you're looking for a book, I thought I could help……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Z-Zenno Rob Roy. T-the librarian……! 
<story>Um, if you're looking for a book, I thought I could help……

data.text: Ah, I-I'm sorry if I'm bothering you!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ah, I-I'm sorry if I'm bothering you!

data.text:
Biographies……! Now that I think about it, they're in a place 
that's kind of confusing. You won't find them under history, 
they're with the essays and novels.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Biographies……! Now that I think about it, they're in a place 
<story>that's kind of confusing. You won't find them under history, 
<story>they're with the essays and novels.

data.text:
You see, biographies often have a lot of fiction 
mixed in. So they're not confused with historical 
facts, they were separated it seems.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>You see, biographies often have a lot of fiction 
<story>mixed in. So they're not confused with historical 
<story>facts, they were separated it seems.

data.text:
Ah, but I think I like them more when fiction is mixed in! When 
you add in anecdotes like that, it helps keep people interested!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah, but I think I like them more when fiction is mixed in! When 
<story>you add in anecdotes like that, it helps keep people interested!

data.text:
Being admired like that, helps it remain in everyone's memory. 
That kind of existence is a hero! That's why, I――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Being admired like that, helps it remain in everyone's memory. 
<story>That kind of existence is a hero! That's why, I――

data.text:
I think that's how over time they become a 『Tale of a Hero』! 
That biographies eventually become heroic tales!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I think that's how over time they become a 『Tale of a Hero』! 
<story>That biographies eventually become heroic tales!

data.text: Ah, um, no…… that's not true, I'm sorry.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ah, um, no…… that's not true, I'm sorry.

data.text:
I was getting excited all on my own…… 
Ah, the shelf with biographies is over there.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I was getting excited all on my own…… 
<story>Ah, the shelf with biographies is over there.

data.text: No…… I'm sorry, please excuse me……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>No…… I'm sorry, please excuse me……!

data.text:
She suddenly became less energetic…… 『That's not true』 
is what she said but, it was hard to believe that 
she didn't based on how she acted.
data.processed:
<story>She suddenly became less energetic…… 『That's not true』 
<story>is what she said but, it was hard to believe that 
<story>she didn't based on how she acted.

data.text:
Why did she deny it though? While thinking that, I decided to 
search for a book on the shelf she mentioned for now.
data.processed:
<story>Why did she deny it though? While thinking that, I decided to 
<story>search for a book on the shelf she mentioned for now.

data.text:
I ended up reading through a lot. Like she said, a lot of fiction 
was mixed in but, even then it was still a great heroic story……!
data.processed:
<story>I ended up reading through a lot. Like she said, a lot of fiction 
<story>was mixed in but, even then it was still a great heroic story……!

data.text:
……when a story starts to often be told in a heroic manner, 
it becomes a heroic tale――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……when a story starts to often be told in a heroic manner, 
<story>it becomes a heroic tale――

data.text:
But my story, hasn't even…… 
No, maybe, it won't ever……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Excuse me, I'd like to borrow this!

data.processed:
<story>But my story, hasn't even…… 
<story>No, maybe, it won't ever……

data.text:
Ah…… okay! You'd like to borrow it, right? 
Oh, that book……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah…… okay! You'd like to borrow it, right? 
<story>Oh, that book……

data.text: ……do you like heroic tales?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I saw a hero-like Uma Musume, so I was interested
choices.processed: <size=32>I saw a hero-like Uma Musume, so I was interested</size>

data.processed: <story>……do you like heroic tales?

data.text:
That Uma Musume's running was vividly etched in to my mind, so I 
had been searching for her this whole time…… is what I told her.
data.processed:
<story>That Uma Musume's running was vividly etched in to my mind, so I 
<story>had been searching for her this whole time…… is what I told her.

data.text: 『A hero-like』 Uma Musume……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>『A hero-like』 Uma Musume……

data.text:
You couldn't help but feel like she was a hero, even if you only 
saw her running from a distance……is what you said, right?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>You couldn't help but feel like she was a hero, even if you only 
<story>saw her running from a distance……is what you said, right?

data.text:
An Uma Musume that can run like that, right now, is at Tracen 
Academy is what you're saying, right……!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>An Uma Musume that can run like that, right now, is at Tracen 
<story>Academy is what you're saying, right……!?

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……！

data.text:
……U-um…… I know we just met today, and I'm aware it's an 
unreasonable request but!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……U-um…… I know we just met today, and I'm aware it's an 
<story>unreasonable request but!

data.text: Can you let me help you with that 『Hero Search』!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Can you let me help you with that 『Hero Search』!?

data.text:
I'm confident in my skills to search for documents and I know a 
lot about heroes! I'll definitely be helpful!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I'm confident in my skills to search for documents and I know a 
<story>lot about heroes! I'll definitely be helpful!

data.text:
It was an offer that was incredibly beneficial to me but, when it 
comes to Tracen Academy, shouldn't a student's priority be to run?
data.processed:
<story>It was an offer that was incredibly beneficial to me but, when it 
<story>comes to Tracen Academy, shouldn't a student's priority be to run?

data.text:
I asked Zenno Rob Roy if helping me would 
get in the way of her training.
data.processed:
<story>I asked Zenno Rob Roy if helping me would 
<story>get in the way of her training.

data.text:
I-it's fine, I'll make it work! ……I really want to know what made 
Trainer-san feel like that Uma Musume was 『Hero-like』.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I-it's fine, I'll make it work! ……I really want to know what made 
<story>Trainer-san feel like that Uma Musume was 『Hero-like』.

data.text: I really want to know! Because――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>I really want to know! Because――

data.text:
N-nevermind! Anyways, it'll definitely be beneficial for me too. 
So I look forward to working with you……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>N-nevermind! Anyways, it'll definitely be beneficial for me too. 
<story>So I look forward to working with you……!

title: It's Almost Like An Epic Poem
